62 class DynamicProgram {
63 private:
65  double thresh_;

69 public:
70  DynamicProgram() {}
71  DynamicProgram(double thresh) : thresh_(thresh) {}
72  virtual ~DynamicProgram() {}
73  // public methods
74  void min(Parts& parts, vector2DMat& scores, vector4DMat& Ix, vector4DMat& Iy, vector4DMat& Ik, vector2DMat& rootv, vector2DMat& rooti);

77 };
